reviews.text: This is a fantastic gallery, combining unique fashion pieces and highly interesting art of different mediums.  The owner, Margherita, is very charming and eager to help.  It was one of the highlights of our week-long stay in Barcelona.

Recently I visited Begemot for its latest Dogny Abreu's sculpture exhibition. I was really surprized by the quality of his work. Called "Origin" this exhibition make us to think about our life, development, values.., about the present past and future. Amazing!
Every time I come to this gallery I descover great art! Always on the top!

If you like art and want to find exclusive jevelery, closes and even sunglases, here is very nice place to visit... I was realy surprised.. i found nice and exclusive shoes.. i LOVE it and i promise that I'll be back 😍

I have passed a few times to this fancy gallery
 The gallery was organized by a pretty lady, I was so amazed by the fantastic  selection of the arts that she had.  a part from the arts collections, she also has high quality and limited edition cloth collections, I can see that she has really good taste. 
 even the decoration itself its really amazing, she has told me that all the furniture are made by artists. You can clear see the differece. 
 Highly recommend for a visit.
Excellent gallery always interesting exhibitions and so nice atmosphere, place where you can see amazing art & fashion ,place where you can meet cool people...
